eventList.title: Talk Shop
eventList.blurb: A conversation about the good, the bad, and the crazy of running your own business.

eventList.title: Talk Shop: Debt vs. Equity
eventList.blurb: Our Talk Shop: Debt vs. Equity panel will feature prominent entrepreneurs, venture capitalists, and lenders from both ends of the lending spectrum discuss the pros and cons to each growth route.

eventList.title: Talk Shop: The Role of Brick and Mortar in the Digital Economy
eventList.blurb: Our Talk Shop: The Role of Brick and Mortar in the Digital Economy panel will allow prominent entrepreneurs in the retail space discuss the ever-changing world of retail.

eventList.title: Talk Shop: The Importance of Building a Brand
eventList.blurb: Our Talk Shop: The Importance of Building a Brand panel will allow renowned creatives in NYC discuss what it takes to build an evergreen brand.
